entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 17 except 12 near Lake Ontario.
entry.summary: Showers or thunderstorms. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 then light near noon. High 17 except 12 near Lake Ontario. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight then light before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
